long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Update: Automatic Chat with Your Matches**

v1.5.8 Update:
- Additional fixes for new Tinder version

Elevate your Tinder experience with Wizard of Swipe, the revolutionary Chrome extension that automates your swiping and now introduces automatic chat functionality. Forget the hassle of endless browsing —let the Wizard of Swipe bring the magic of perfect matches directly to you and start engaging instantly!

Automatic Chat: Our new feature takes automation to the next level by automatically generating messages for your new matches and open conversations. Start chatting without delay, increasing your chances of making a genuine connection.

Automated Swiping: Powered by advanced AI, Wizard of Swipe analyzes profiles and intelligently swipes right on those that meet your specific preferences and left on those that don't, ensuring more accurate matches.

Customizable Preferences: Set your criteria with our detailed filters for beauty, ethnicity, height, and relationship goals to refine your matches to those who truly resonate with your preferences.

Time Saver: Wizard of Swipe works seamlessly in the background. Go about your day and return to a curated list of potential matches who meet your standards, already engaged in conversation.

Privacy and Security: Your preferences, swiping patterns, and chat history remain confidential. Wizard of Swipe operates locally in your browser, ensuring no data is shared with any server.

User-Friendly Interface: Installing and configuring Wizard of Swipe is a breeze. Set up in minutes and watch as your dating life transforms with minimal effort.


Why Choose Wizard of Swipe?

Wizard of Swipe leverages sophisticated AI to optimize your chances of finding the right match on Tinder. Our smart algorithm adapts to your preferences, and now with the automatic chat feature, it simplifies your path to engaging with potential partners. Whether you're seeking a light-hearted connection or a deep, meaningful relationship, Wizard of Swipe streamlines your search for love.

Download Wizard of Swipe now and let the magic of intelligent swiping and chatting streamline your search for love!
